nodes.bodyText:
I have a concern about adding - and v and that it could lead to false negatives. We are only looking for the 1 character and not even testing what comes after --.
I don't know all maven arguments, but here is some examples I went off of:
mvn test
mvn -e test
mvn -version
mvn --version
mvn --not-e
mvn -verbose no e

Can we do some type of lookahead check for this? Maybe: (mvn [^-])|(mvn \-(?!v)(?!-v)[^e])
This won't hamper performance either, will it?
